column3: Latest;Prey Veng : On the afternoon of January 15
column4: 2020 at 1:58 pm in Sangker Chum Village
column8: police arrested a 29-year- old male and seized a rifle.------The operation was launched following the confessions of another man that said he had sold the weapon to Horn Nang
column9: who was planning a robbery.------The suspects was brought to Svay Antor district’s Teuk Thla administrative office for questioning and due process.------Source: Department of Education website Via ------TDNEWS
